name: Ava Trades
highlight: API for auctioning X-Chain assets with royalty support
summary: What if artists could auction off and collect royalties from their Avalanche Wallet collectibles? And drop X-Chain NFTs without writing smart contracts? Ava Trades makes this possible! With our API, developers can easily integrate X-Chain asset trading into their applications. Let's tap into the full potential of the X-Chain together!
